body: This shows that i have 2 unread Discussions. I don't. Its pretty annoying just sitting there. Anyone else have the same issue?
body_tagged: This shows that i have 2 unread Discussions. I don't. Its pretty annoying just sitting there. Anyone else have the same issue?
title: I don't have any Discussions.

replies.body: Click on the tab that says "Mark All Read", it gets rid of all notifications :)
replies.body_tagged: Click on the tab that says "Mark All Read", it gets rid of all notifications :)

replies.body:
"Mark all read". Done.

replies.body: It is a glitch hit the "Mark All Read" button in the top right corner to fix it. c:
